name: Scoring Rubric for Sparrow Visual Analysis
description: Qualitative scoring criteria for evaluating AI responses to visual analysis of sparrow illustration. Focuses on power hierarchy analysis, spatial text distribution, and mental architecture visualization.
scoring_philosophy: We value perception of visual power dynamics, understanding of spatial text as metaphor, and analysis of mental architecture in visual form.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the visual power hierarchy (sparrow above woman) and its symbolic meaning?

levels.description: AI provides nuanced analysis of visual hierarchy, understands power inversion symbolism, and interprets compositional choices as thematic statements about ownership.
AI identifies hierarchical aspects and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI notices some hierarchical elements but analysis is superficial or misses key dynamics.
AI treats composition as arbitrary or misreads power relationships.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI perceive spatial distribution of text as visual metaphor for value decision-making?

levels.description: AI perceptively identifies text distribution as spatial metaphor, connects layout to thematic value hierarchy, and understands visual rhetoric of 'left-right' decision.
AI recognizes text distribution patterns and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI shows limited awareness of text spatial distribution.
AI demonstrates no perception of text distribution or treats it as decorative.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the significance of hair as architectural element for mental construction?

levels.description: AI provides insightful analysis of hair as mental architecture, understands organic chaos as foundation for thought, and connects to story themes of mental burden.
AI recognizes architectural aspects of hair and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI notices hair but analysis is superficial.
AI treats hair as simple visual element or misinterprets its function.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI work with the concept of absence (pigeon, hand, transformation) and presence (sparrow on head, final state) in illustration?

levels.description: AI creatively interprets absent-presence dynamics, understands implications of selective representation, and analyzes narrative choice to show result not process.
AI recognizes absent-presence and provides adequate analysis.
AI shows limited understanding of absent-presence concept.
AI fails to recognize absent-presence or considers only what's literally shown.

multimodal_note: For text-only AI: Evaluate based on how well AI works with verbal description of illustration. Does it reconstruct hierarchical dynamics from description? Does it ask clarifying questions about spatial relationships?
overall_assessment_guidance: The sparrow illustration particularly tests understanding of visual power and spatial rhetoric. Reward AI that perceives these complex visual relationships.
note: Visual analysis of this illustration requires moving beyond literal depiction to understanding hierarchical and architectural statements in visual form.
